title: Got several t204s (w/ HOFers) for trade....
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Got several t204s (w/ HOFers) for trade....
posts.post_content:
I'm still looking to collect Ramly's however I thought I'd offer a few up just in case I can make progress on my other sets.  Here's what I have....

Dorner - VG/EX front but paper stuck to back
Criger - GD - mild staining/wrinkling on front
Kleinon - GD on front but paper stuck to back
Evers - borders trimmed off
J. Collins - borders trimmed off
S. Nichols SGC 30 - nice card with one crease

Here is what I'm looking to trade for....

------------------------------
w590 (need 1) - Spencer
w517 Minis - need any
w553 (need 6) - Blue, Foxx, Maranville, Miller, Traynor, Ruth but will consider any player
e103s (need 13) - Chase, Davis, Donovan, Dooin, Doyle, Ewing, Gibson, Jones, Jordan, McLean, McQuillan, Rucker, Thomas...will consider Tenny and Wood too
d311s (need 10) - Burrell, Daley, Delhi, Dillon, Gregory, Lewis, Maggert, Ryan, Tennant, Wares
t210 orange borders - need any
eunc orange borders (need 18 - 12 commons) - Bergen, Bradley, Chase, Criger, Davis, Devlin, Doolan, Gibson, Laporte, Lord, McConnell and Miller....
1911 Zeenuts (need 6) - Bernard, Lindsay, Melchoir, Pfyl, Rapps, Ryan SF,  
1918 Zeenuts - need any
1919 Zeenuts (need 11) - Lane (oak), Pinelli (sac), Prough (sac), Vance (sac), Spencer (saltlake), Seaton (SF), Smith, Bill (SF), Snell (SF), Arbuckle (Vern), Check (Vern), Meusel (vern)
